abstract: CBS is sitting on about $3 billion in cash, and with the hiring last November of new-media dealmeister Quincy Smith, everybody has been wondering what the company has in store. CBS Chief Executive Leslie Moonves offered little in the way of hints either during his keynote address Tuesday at the Consumer Electronics Show or in a backstage interview with paidContent’s Staci D. Kramer.
lead_paragraph: CBS is sitting on about $3 billion in cash, and with the hiring last November of new-media dealmeister Quincy Smith, everybody has been wondering what the company has in store. CBS Chief Executive Leslie Moonves offered little in the way of hints either during his keynote address Tuesday at the Consumer Electronics Show or in a backstage interview with paidContent’s Staci D. Kramer.

headline.main: Moonves Speaks, But Offers Few Hints on M&A
